name: R.O.O.T.S. - Rust Overwhelms Owen's Trapped Servicebot
name_original: R.O.O.T.S. - Rust Overwhelms Owen's Trapped Servicebot
description:
You're playing as a servicebot who wakes up confused and in the dark.

Just click through. 

Endings guide:

  • 0: run out of time
  • 1: explore everything, but do nothing else
  • 2: do all 5 reflections
  • 3: perform some extreme renovation
  • 4: all 3 play actions, reflect on owen, time, and shelter, full renovate
